original_title: Red Hot Chilli Peppers: Bonnaroo Festival
overview: Filmed in 2012 at Great Stage Park, Manchester, TN, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic RHCP featuring unforgettable version of their hits: 'Califonication', 'Give It Away', 'Scar Tissue' and many more.
title: Red Hot Chilli Peppers: Bonnaroo Festival
